data.lyric:
[ti:Wildest Dreams (Taylor's Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Wildest Dreams (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Wildest Dreams (Taylor's Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:04.47]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Shellback/Max Martin
[00:08.94]Composed by：Taylor Swift/Shellback/Max Martin
[00:13.42]He said let's get out of this town
[00:16.60]Drive out of the city away from the crowds
[00:20.09]I thought Heaven can't help me now
[00:23.26]Nothing lasts forever
[00:25.84]But this is gonna take me down
[00:27.96]He's so tall and handsome as hell
[00:31.42]He's so bad but he does it so well
[00:34.61]I can see the end as it begins
[00:37.85]My one condition is
[00:40.89]
[00:41.39]Say you'll remember me
[00:43.77]Standing in a nice dress staring at the sunset babe
[00:48.36]Red lips and rosy cheeks say you'll see me again
[00:52.53]Even if it's just in your
[00:55.23]Wildest dreams aah ha
[01:00.61]
[01:01.97]Wildest dreams aah ha
[01:08.11]
[01:11.77]I said no one has to know what we do
[01:14.68]His hands are in my hair
[01:16.39]His clothes are in my room
[01:18.85]And his voice is a familiar sound
[01:21.68]Nothing lasts forever
[01:24.08]But this is getting good now
[01:26.36]He's so tall and handsome as hell
[01:29.64]He's so bad but he does it so well
[01:33.02]And when we've had our very last kiss
[01:36.02]My last request it is
[01:39.65]Say you'll remember me
[01:42.07]Standing in a nice dress staring at the sunset babe
[01:46.66]Red lips and rosy cheeks say you'll see me again
[01:50.76]Even if it's just in your
[01:53.58]Wildest dreams aah ha
[02:00.36]Wildest dreams aah ha
[02:06.98]You see me in hindsight
[02:08.72]Tangled up with you all night
[02:10.56]Burning it down
[02:13.87]Some day when you leave me
[02:15.53]I bet these memories
[02:17.34]Follow you around
[02:20.64]You see me in hindsight
[02:22.39]Tangled up with you all night
[02:24.17]Burning it down
[02:27.55]Some day when you leave me
[02:29.22]I bet these memories
[02:31.04]Follow you around
[02:38.08]Say you'll remember me
[02:40.45]Standing in a nice dress
[02:42.19]Staring at the sunset babe
[02:44.97]Red lips and rosy cheeks say
[02:47.49]You'll see me again
[02:49.03]Even if it's just pretend
[02:53.34]Say you'll remember me
[02:56.12]Standing in a nice dress staring at the sunset babe
[03:00.23]Red lips and rosy cheeks say you'll see me again
[03:04.40]Even if it's just in your
[03:07.29]Wildest dreams aah ha
[03:13.92]Wildest dreams aah ha
[03:18.48]Even if it's just in your
[03:20.97]Wildest dreams aah ha
[03:26.83]In your wildest dreams aah ha
data.trans:
[ti:Wildest Dreams (Taylor's Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Wildest Dreams (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.47]//
[00:08.94]//
[00:13.42]他说走吧 我们一起逃离这座城
[00:16.60]逃离这座喧扰的城 远离纷扰的人群
[00:20.09]料想即便是老天都爱莫能助
[00:23.26]没有什么能永恒啊
[00:25.84]而他却总是将我的防备击得粉碎
[00:27.96]他高大帅气 气质不凡
[00:31.42]他的坏跟他是那么的相得益彰
[00:34.61]一切才刚刚开始 我便能预知结局
[00:37.85]而我唯一的条件就是
[00:40.89]
[00:41.39]说你会记得我
[00:43.77]穿着精致的华服 凝视着日落
[00:48.36]还有我的红唇粉颊 说你会与我重逢
[00:52.53]即便是在你狂野的梦中
[00:55.23]不羁狂野的梦
[01:00.61]
[01:01.97]不羁狂野的梦
[01:08.11]
[01:11.77]我说没人会知晓我们的曾经
[01:14.68]他的手抚摸着我的长发
[01:16.39]他的衣服遗落在我的房间
[01:18.85]他的声音是那么的熟悉
[01:21.68]没有什么能永恒啊
[01:24.08]而我渐渐的学会了坦然接受
[01:26.36]他高大帅气 气质不凡
[01:29.64]他的坏跟他是那么的相得益彰
[01:33.02]我们的分手之吻后
[01:36.02]我最后的请求便是
[01:39.65]说你会记得我
[01:42.07]穿着精致的华服 凝视着日落
[01:46.66]还有我的红唇粉颊 说你会与我重逢
[01:50.76]即便是在你狂野的梦中
[01:53.58]不羁狂野的梦
[02:00.36]不羁狂野的梦
[02:06.98]事后你看清了我
[02:08.72]那个我们整夜缠绵的夜晚
[02:10.56]曾经的激情渐渐散去
[02:13.87]有一天当你离开我时
[02:15.53]我敢说这些回忆
[02:17.34]依然对你如影随形
[02:20.64]事后你看清了我
[02:22.39]那个我们整夜缠绵的夜晚
[02:24.17]曾经的激情渐渐散去
[02:27.55]有一天当你离开我时
[02:29.22]我敢说这些回忆
[02:31.04]依然对你如影随形
[02:38.08]说你会记得我
[02:40.45]穿着精致的华服
[02:42.19]凝视着日落
[02:44.97]还有我的红唇粉颊
[02:47.49]说你会与我重逢
[02:49.03]即便那只是谎言
[02:53.34]说你会记得我
[02:56.12]穿着精致的华服 凝视着日落
[03:00.23]还有我的红唇粉颊 说你会与我重逢
[03:04.40]即便是在你狂野的梦中
[03:07.29]不羁狂野的梦
[03:13.92]不羁狂野的梦
[03:18.48]即便是在你狂野的梦中
